---



<!-- WARNING: this file was generated by Pulumi Docs Generator. -->
<!-- Do not edit by hand unless you're certain you know what you are doing! -->

Use this data source to get the default EBS encryption KMS key in the current region.


{{% examples %}}
## Example Usage

{{< chooser language "typescript,python,go,csharp" / >}}

{{% example csharp %}}
```csharp
using Pulumi;
using Aws = Pulumi.Aws;

class MyStack : Stack
{
    public MyStack()
    {
        var current = Output.Create(Aws.Ebs.GetDefaultKmsKey.InvokeAsync());
        var example = new Aws.Ebs.Volume("example", new Aws.Ebs.VolumeArgs
        {
            AvailabilityZone = "us-west-2a",
            Encrypted = true,
            KmsKeyId = current.Apply(current => current.KeyArn),
        });
    }

}
```

{{% /example %}}

{{% example go %}}
```go
package main

import (
	"github.com/pulumi/pulumi-aws/sdk/v3/go/aws/ebs"
	"github.com/pulumi/pulumi/sdk/v2/go/pulumi"
)

func main() {
	pulumi.Run(func(ctx *pulumi.Context) error {
		current, err := ebs.LookupDefaultKmsKey(ctx, nil, nil)
		if err != nil {
			return err
		}
		_, err = ebs.NewVolume(ctx, "example", &ebs.VolumeArgs{
			AvailabilityZone: pulumi.String("us-west-2a"),
			Encrypted:        pulumi.Bool(true),
			KmsKeyId:         pulumi.String(current.KeyArn),
		})
		if err != nil {
			return err
		}
		return nil
	})
}
```

{{% /example %}}

{{% example python %}}
```python
import pulumi
import pulumi_aws as aws

current = aws.ebs.get_default_kms_key()
example = aws.ebs.Volume("example",
    availability_zone="us-west-2a",
    encrypted=True,
    kms_key_id=current.key_arn)
```

{{% /example %}}

{{% example typescript %}}

```typescript
import * as pulumi from "@pulumi/pulumi";
import * as aws from "@pulumi/aws";

const current = aws.ebs.getDefaultKmsKey({});
const example = new aws.ebs.Volume("example", {
    availabilityZone: "us-west-2a",
    encrypted: true,
    kmsKeyId: current.then(current => current.keyArn),
});
```
